product.title: Features
product.description: Discover the powerful AI coding capabilities that make development faster and smarter.

meta.title: Cubent Coder - AI Coding Assistant
meta.description: Meet Cubent Coder, the autonomous AI coding assistant for VS Code. Generate code, debug issues, write docs, and automate tasks with natural language commands.

features.title: Powerful AI Coding Capabilities
features.description: Discover how Cubent Coder's advanced AI features can revolutionize your development workflow.

items.title: Natural Language Coding
items.description: Generate, refactor, and debug code using simple natural language commands. Just describe what you want and watch Cubent Coder bring it to life.

items.title: Autonomous Agent Mode
items.description: Let Cubent Coder work independently on complex tasks, making decisions and executing actions with minimal supervision.

items.title: Smart File Operations
items.description: Read, write, and modify files across your entire workspace. Cubent Coder understands your project structure and maintains context.

items.title: Terminal Integration
items.description: Execute commands, run tests, and manage your development environment directly through AI-powered terminal interactions.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Get quick answers to common questions about Cubent Coder. Learn how to get started, understand the features, and make the most of your AI coding assistant.

items.question: What is Cubent Coder?
items.answer: Cubent Coder is an AI-powered autonomous coding agent that works as a VS Code extension. It can generate code, debug issues, write documentation, and automate development tasks using natural language commands.

items.question: How do I install Cubent Coder?
items.answer: Simply install the extension from the VS Code Marketplace, connect your preferred AI provider (OpenAI, Anthropic, or custom), and start coding with AI assistance immediately.

items.question: What AI models does it support?
items.answer: Cubent Coder works with any OpenAI-compatible API, including GPT-4, Claude, and custom local models. You can easily switch between providers based on your needs.

items.question: Is my code secure?
items.answer: Yes, your code security is our priority. Cubent Coder processes code locally in your VS Code environment and only sends necessary context to your chosen AI provider. You maintain full control over what data is shared.

items.question: Can I use custom modes?
items.answer: Absolutely! Cubent Coder supports unlimited custom modes, allowing you to create specialized AI personas for security auditing, code review, documentation, or any specific development task.

cta.title: Start Coding with AI Today
